formatted_address: 750 Chai Chee Rd, #01-12 ESR BizPark@Chai Chee, Singapore 469000
name: PastaMania - Viva Business Park

reviews.text: Pastamania foods are good but this shop manageress, Dona in black dress, said cannot bring outside when we took only one piece of garlic biscuit to dip mushroom soup for our grandson! see photos. This is ridiculous policy or she misunderstood policy?? ðŸ˜³
Another my favorite restaurant. The food was incredibly delicious. The service was very friendly. I didn't need to wait for long to get my food. 5/5 stars. Recommended!

Pasta mania stall is located in Viva Business Park. The food is surprisingly serve pippin hot from the oven. The garlic bread is crisp and just right, with a well made mushrooms soup. After the Covid restrictions have been lifted, both food taste and service has been hits-or-missed. At times, the food can be good and other time, the food is just average

I am not too sure about the closing time, but I am satisfied with the food. The service can be further improve by offering advice on what is recommended.

Despite the cost of food has increased, and it would be great to have tie - in rebate. Overall, a wonderful dinner.
Customer service  is great. The staffs are so helpful and knowledgeable about the product. The seafood tom yam is the best. Gonna repeat soon.
Very good food . I love it.. very friendly service from the staffs. Highly recommended for those who are looking Italian cuisine

vicinity: 750 Chai Chee Road, #01-12 ESR BizPark@Chai Chee
